name: Morfit
body:
Morfit is an interactive surface reconstruction software described in the paper:

[K. Yin, H. Huang, H. Zhang, M. Gong, D. Cohen-or, B. Chen. Morfit: Interactive Surface Reconstruction from Incomplete Point Clouds with Curve-Driven Topology and Geometry Control. ACM Transactions on Graphics 33(6)(Proc.SIGGRAPH ASIA 2014 )](http://vcc.szu.edu.cn/research/2014/Morfit/)

![](images/ui.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
